name: Subdivided
description: Subdivided is an open world survival game where you play as a coyote increasingly trapped in heightened suburban encroachment. As time goes on and more houses are built in the neighborhood and the natural food supply diminishes - forcing you to need to venture further and further into the human areas in order to stay alive. Stealth and tactical routes will be important to remain undetected. You can try your luck and go in aggressively but, beware some residents may be armed.
